      • CoffeeItem

                  java.lang.String size,

                  java.lang.String sweet,
                  java.lang.String milk,
                  java.lang.String temp,
                  java.lang.String special)
        constructor with parameters inherited from drinkITem
        Parameters:
        name - represents name (Coffee)
        cost - double represents cost of coffee
        size - String representing S/M/L
        flavor - String representing coffee flavors (Hazelnut, Vanilla, etc;)
        sweet - String representing teaspoons of sugar (1-10)
        milk - String representing milk base (whole,no milk)
        temp - String representing temperature (blended,iced,hot)
        special - String representing user's special instructions
